name: Origin - Shattered Universe
description:
You wake up in a mysterious dark underwater facility with abilities you can't explain, for some reason you can slow time and distort gravity, you also seem to be able to jump higher than normal people, did they experiment on you? With no memory of how you got to where ever this facility is, with time shattered and memory leaks all over the place, you must find a way to defend yourself and YOU must find a way to solve the puzzles to escape this failing facility before its too late. But beware of what secrets might be hiding there.

This is a time based puzzle solving game where the player has abilities such as:
Double jump
Gravity distortion
Slow Motion
as well as a gun to defend yourself from enemies.

The game consists of 3 chapters with 9 levels per chapter
